amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike a provision that allows Governors to apply for and receive direct grants from the Federal Government and which preempts State education agencies from their oversight and operational responsibilities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part A of House Report 112-200 to strike `governor of a state' from the definition of `state entity' on page 20, thus removing Governors' eligibility to apply for federal grant funding to oversee charter school operations in their states.
